name: Petrichor Alpha
description:
Petrichor is a first-person roguelite, that puts you in a Victorian manor, and challenges you to escape. However, not all is as it seems, as the manor quickly becomes a labyrinth with each open door and continuously pits its nefarious forces against you. 

Will you be able to survive its denizens and twisting corridors to uncover the dark secret at its heart, or be lost to its endless halls forever? 

Please note, the game is a prototype still in development.
